skillTree.localised_description: Cobbled together from the remains of several anicent Sea Serpents, the Depth Guard's Master infuses this unholy abomination's twisted form into his servent. The process is imperfect though resulting in a temporary transformation.

ui_effects.localised_text: Form offers powerful melee attacks and flight
Restricted spell availability and reduction in Harmony multiplier

skillTree.localised_description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: "I say you can find out the servants of Death by their marks. No man is born so unnatural that his body does not revolt at the foul pollution of Undead blood.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
"Yes, they’re from the east. Annoying, yet useful - their hides, particularly…"
If there's swash to be buckled, this one will be right at the front, in the thick of the fray.
Strike true; strike hard.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
There is something to be said for whipping the foe into a frenzy before the fight is joined.
"Dark Magic might be effective, but there's no substitute for a good blade in your hands."
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The strength and agility of the Vampire comes from a place beyond: the supernatural realm of the Unliving.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
You have to watch this one - when you shake their hand, count your fingers afterwards.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform

Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Invocated Oath"

skillTree.localised_description: The tidal currents shall slow the foe's advance.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Tidecall Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: No matter how far away, none can escape the Kiss of the Deep, nor breathe again with lungs full of seawater.
Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…
Whirl of Blades

effects.description: You're body moves with supernatural speed and precision, slicing all in your path into bloody ribbons

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Ordo Profundum - They Came From The Deep

ui_effects.localised_text: Reflects melee damage dealt to unit back at the attacker

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Not on or below a platform

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Ever searching for a worthy opponent, only the most skilled shall ever have a chance of drawing blood from I
Fury is a tool, to revel in it is weakness.
Through eons of violence, one must be careful lest they fall into insanity. Pledge yourself instead to the thrill of perfection and not the act itself
The cattle rise and fall like grains of sand, we however, endure forever in our pursuit of total martial mastery.
